'''0.0.20a_02'''<ref>{{ytl|n4cRiFGrwJc|Minecraft - Mein Secret Hideout|L4DWonton|June 24, 2009}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 20, 2009, at 21:39 UTC to fix two bugs affecting the game.<ref>[[#june 21 logs|June 21 IRC logs]]: "''A9:52:15 <Quatroking> we're currently running on 20a_2 already :P''" (14:52 UTC)</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Lava JE5.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE4.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Water JE4.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Water JE3.png|32px]].

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed water transparency bug from the previous version.
** Water no longer have light blue bits in their borders.
** Water no longer sometimes looks opaque.
* Usernames are easier to read.
